detail_desc: Long-sleeved silk blouse with a small stand-up collar and concealed buttons down the front. Wide cuffs with a slit and button, and a rounded hem.
Headband in a soft knit containing some wool with a draped detail at the front. Width approx. 11.5 cm.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective, mirrored lenses.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Fitted mesh top with long sleeves.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons at the front and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined in recycled polyester.

Jacket in washed denim with worn details and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, buttons at the cuffs and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Round-necked jersey T-shirt in a cotton blend.
One hair clip and four hair grips in metal decorated with plastic beads and sparkly stones. Length from 6.5 cm to 9.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in stretch jersey with a wide neckline and gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, a double-layered drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft waffle-knit cotton blend with a zipped pocket on one sleeve.

Short, V-neck cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool. Sparkly stone buttons down the front, short puff sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Jacket in soft fleece made partly from recycled polyester designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves. Narrow elasticated trim at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Skater skirt in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an embroidered pattern and an elasticated waist.
Short, off-the-shoulder, fitted dress in a smocked weave with short, frill-trimmed sleeves and a frill trim at the top and hem.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a V-neck, buttons at the top and short sleeves.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket, long sleeves with narrow buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Fully lined bikini top with laser-cut scalloped edges. Underwired, moulded, padded cups that lift and shape, ties at the back of the neck and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Joggers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated, ribbed drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Short-sleeved shirt in a viscose weave with a resort collar and buttons down the front. Slightly longer at the front with ties at the hem.

Base layer set in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned sections. Top with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with ribbing at the waist and hems. The base layer set is designed with the minimal number of seams for a more comfortable fit.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and a lower section in woven fabric with broderie anglaise.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a V neck and lace back. Seam at the waist and long, flared lace sleeves. Unlined.
Padded, waterproof hi-tops in imitation leather with elasticated lacing, an adjustable hook and loop tab and shimmering metallic tongue. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short, straight-cut dress in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Unlined.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, long sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Cap in cotton twill with a soft, brushed finish. Adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Hi-tops in imitation leather and mesh with a padded shaft, adjustable hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Metal hair grips.
V-neck blouse in a crêpe weave with flounces around the neckline that continue down the front. Yoke at the back with gathers to add width, and long sleeves with a pleat and buttons at the cuffs.
T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Ankle-length, wide culottes in velour with an elasticated waist.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, detachable tie belt, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets and legs with creases.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Fitted, knee-length dress in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Square neckline, long sleeves, and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Short-sleeved dress in soft, patterned, organic cotton jersey with a round neckline, a gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt.

Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps, a racer back, elasticated ribbing at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in textured-knit cotton with a shawl collar with a wrapover front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey.
Fine-knit T-shirt in a soft cotton and silk blend with a slight sheen. Ribbed neckline, short sleeves with ribbing, and short slits in the sides.
Fitted top in stretch, ribbed cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Belt with two rows of metal eyelets and a metal buckle. Width 4 cm.

Non-wired sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Medium support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Fitted jacket woven in a patterned viscose blend with notch lapels, welt front pockets, a single button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Hoop earrings in metal with a decorative punched pattern, plastic beads and small pendants. Length 5 cm.

Blouse in an airy, crinkled weave. Low-cut back with a small frill trim and wide ties at the back. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication, and a gathered seam under the bust for added width. Jersey lining.

Wide, straight-cut coat in twill made from a viscose blend with a soft brushed finish. Notch lapels, shoulder tabs with a decorative button, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with a tab and button. Detachable tie belt at the waist, pockets in the side seams, and a single back vent. Unlined.
Comfort blankets in an airy cotton weave, one with an all-over print. Size 60x60 cm.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.
Socks knitted in a soft wool blend with a ribbed shaft.
Joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a chest pocket and ribbed neckline.
Sports joggers in jersey made from a cotton blend with taped details. Elasticated waist, a slightly lower crotch with a ventilating mesh section, and zipped side pockets.
Large shopper in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with two handles and a zip at the top and two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 16.5x30x30 cm.
Beret in fine-knit wool containing some nylon.
Oversized, padded jacket in woven fabric with a padded hood and concealed press-studs down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and side pockets. Lined.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of joggers in patterned sweatshirt fabric. Top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.

Long-sleeved shirt in washed Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

No-show trainer socks in fast-drying, functional yarn. The socks are low cut so they are hidden inside your shoes. Ventilating hole-knit sections over the feet and a concealed silicone trim around the heels for best fit. The polyester content of the socks is partly recycled.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with a skirt in a broderie anglaise weave. Elasticated waist.
Coat in a felted wool blend with narrow notch lapels, concealed buttons at the front, and welt side pockets. Lined.
Short yoga top in fast-drying functional fabric. Wrapover front with an opening at the top, open section at the back, long sleeves and gathers in the sides.
T-shirt in soft, printed jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Long-sleeved, off-the-shoulder top in sweatshirt fabric with a lace trim at the top and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trainers with hook and loop fasteners at the top and a lightly padded edge around the heels. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly with a press-stud. Hard-worn details with patches on the inside, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Thin metal rings in various designs.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with worn details. Concealed adjustable elastication at the waist, a visible press-stud fly and embroidery at the hems.
Top in cotton jersey with a motif on the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Slightly rounded hem.
Shorts in a cotton weave with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets.One pair with an all-over print.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist with a frill trim.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned jersey made from a cotton blend with a zip at the back, side pockets and a seam at the waist with pleats.
Short dress in slub cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline, short, frill-trimmed dolman sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist.
